FuncDef: This command specifies a log ID destination. This parameter is mandatory when configuring a log destination. This command instructs log events to be directed to CLI sessions. An operator can subscribe to a CLI log from within a CLI session using thetools perform log subscribe-to log-idcommand. The events are sent to the CLI session for the duration of that CLI session or until anunsubscribe-fromcommand is issued.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the number of events that can be stored in the router s memory. Values-50 to 3000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
